ImageFile.Stoner__Image__imagefuncs__asint¶

ImageFile.Stoner__Image__imagefuncs__asint(dtype=<class 'numpy.uint16'>)¶

Convert the image to unsigned integer format.

May raise warnings about loss of precision.
